# Tools for Computational Optimal Transport in R 

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/T4transport)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=T4transport)
<!-- badges: end -->

We introduce **T4transport**, an **R** package designed as a computational toolkit that 
compiles a collection of algorithms in the field of optimal transport. 

## Installation

* Option 1 : **released** version from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org).

``` r
install.packages("T4transport")
```

* Option 2 : **development** version from [GitHub](https://github.com/kisungyou/T4transport).

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kisungyou/T4transport")
```
